title: Edit: Never mind, problem solved.
body:
I'm linking this thread here, where BroPoro told us Monday would be the day we got new missions.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/xgRugnoc-not-getting-worlds-2017-missions

Except now it's monday, and it's 8PM, and there still are no new missions. I really want that chroma and border, so I don't want missions to be bugging out. I bought the worlds pass, which shows my dedication, so can anyone tell me what's going on?

replies.body:
Yeeeeaaaaa a little bit of patience goes a long way xD! The missions were set for Oct 2nd which is today.....Tuesday.....yay new missions!

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
NEVER MIND THIS POST. The worlds missions popped up just as I posted this thread. Complete conincedence,  but the problem is solved!
